POST /accounts/{account_id}/ai/run/{mode.description:
This endpoint provides users with the capability to run specific AI models on-demand.

By submitting the required input data, users can receive real-time predictions or results generated by the chosen AI
model. The endpoint supports various AI model types, ensuring flexibility and adaptability for diverse use cases.

Model specific inputs available in [Cloudflare Docs](https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers-ai/models/).

text.description: The text that you want to classify

guidance.description: Controls how closely the generated image should adhere to the prompt; higher values make the image more aligned with the prompt

height.description: The height of the generated image in pixels

image.description: For use with img2img tasks. An array of integers that represent the image data constrained to 8-bit unsigned integer values

image_b64.description: For use with img2img tasks. A base64-encoded string of the input image

mask.description: An array representing An array of integers that represent mask image data for inpainting constrained to 8-bit unsigned integer values

negative_prompt.description: Text describing elements to avoid in the generated image

num_steps.description: The number of diffusion steps; higher values can improve quality but take longer

prompt.description: A text description of the image you want to generate

seed.description: Random seed for reproducibility of the image generation

strength.description: A value between 0 and 1 indicating how strongly to apply the transformation during img2img tasks; lower values make the output closer to the input image

width.description: The width of the generated image in pixels

lang.description: The speech language (e.g., 'en' for English, 'fr' for French). Defaults to 'en' if not specified

prompt.description: A text description of the audio you want to generate

oneOf.description: Batch of text values to embed

audio.description: An array of integers that represent the audio data constrained to 8-bit unsigned integer values

source_lang.description: The language of the recorded audio

target_lang.description: The language to translate the transcription into. Currently only English is supported.

image.description: An array of integers that represent the image data constrained to 8-bit unsigned integer values

oneOf.description: The image to use for detection

image.description: An array of integers that represent the image data constrained to 8-bit unsigned integer values

frequency_penalty.description: Decreases the likelihood of the model repeating the same lines verbatim.

lora.description: Name of the LoRA (Low-Rank Adaptation) model to fine-tune the base model.

max_tokens.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate in the response.

presence_penalty.description: Increases the likelihood of the model introducing new topics.

prompt.description: The input text prompt for the model to generate a response.

raw.description: If true, a chat template is not applied and you must adhere to the specific model's expected formatting.

repetition_penalty.description: Penalty for repeated tokens; higher values discourage repetition.

seed.description: Random seed for reproducibility of the generation.

stream.description: If true, the response will be streamed back incrementally using SSE, Server Sent Events.

temperature.description: Controls the randomness of the output; higher values produce more random results.

top_k.description: Limits the AI to choose from the top 'k' most probable words. Lower values make responses more focused; higher values introduce more variety and potential surprises.

top_p.description: Adjusts the creativity of the AI's responses by controlling how many possible words it considers. Lower values make outputs more predictable; higher values allow for more varied and creative responses.

frequency_penalty.description: Decreases the likelihood of the model repeating the same lines verbatim.

max_tokens.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate in the response.

messages.description: An array of message objects representing the conversation history.

content.description: The content of the message as a string.

role.description: The role of the message sender (e.g., 'user', 'assistant', 'system', 'tool').

presence_penalty.description: Increases the likelihood of the model introducing new topics.

raw.description: If true, a chat template is not applied and you must adhere to the specific model's expected formatting.

repetition_penalty.description: Penalty for repeated tokens; higher values discourage repetition.

seed.description: Random seed for reproducibility of the generation.

stream.description: If true, the response will be streamed back incrementally using SSE, Server Sent Events.

temperature.description: Controls the randomness of the output; higher values produce more random results.

tools.description: A list of tools available for the assistant to use.

description.description: A brief description of what the tool does.

name.description: The name of the tool. More descriptive the better.

parameters.description: Schema defining the parameters accepted by the tool.

description.description: A description of the expected parameter.

type.description: The data type of the parameter.
The type of the parameters object (usually 'object').

source_lang.description: The language code of the source text (e.g., 'en' for English). Defaults to 'en' if not specified

target_lang.description: The language code to translate the text into (e.g., 'es' for Spanish)

input_text.description: The text that you want the model to summarize

max_length.description: The maximum length of the generated summary in tokens

oneOf.description: Binary string representing the image contents.

oneOf.description: An array of classification results for the input text

label.description: The classification label assigned to the text (e.g., 'POSITIVE' or 'NEGATIVE')

score.description: Confidence score indicating the likelihood that the text belongs to the specified label

oneOf.title: Text Classification

oneOf.description: The generated image in PNG format
oneOf.title: Text To Image

audio.description: The generated audio in MP3 format, base64-encoded

oneOf.description: The generated audio in MP3 format

data.description: Embeddings of the requested text values

items.description: Floating point embedding representation shaped by the embedding model

end.description: The ending second when the word completes

start.description: The second this word begins in the recording

label.description: The predicted category or class for the input image based on analysis

score.description: A confidence value, between 0 and 1, indicating how certain the model is about the predicted label

oneOf.description: An array of detected objects within the input image

box.description: Coordinates defining the bounding box around the detected object

xmax.description: The x-coordinate of the bottom-right corner of the bounding box

xmin.description: The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the bounding box

ymax.description: The y-coordinate of the bottom-right corner of the bounding box

ymin.description: The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the bounding box

label.description: The class label or name of the detected object

score.description: Confidence score indicating the likelihood that the detection is correct

oneOf.title: Object Detection

response.description: The generated text response from the model

tool_calls.description: An array of tool calls requests made during the response generation

arguments.description: The arguments passed to be passed to the tool call request

name.description: The name of the tool to be called

usage.description: Usage statistics for the inference request

completion_tokens.description: Total number of tokens in output

prompt_tokens.description: Total number of tokens in input

total_tokens.description: Total number of input and output tokens

translated_text.description: The translated text in the target language

summary.description: The summarized version of the input text
